name: Hypcampex
summary: Hypcampex is a 2D-Platformer that embarks you on a remarkable adventure across Planet Photonus as the legendary Electrex Bolt, where he strives to acquire the Artifact of the Hypcampex and battle through the war against the malevolent Avengers of Light, the Lavengers.

name: Hyper Fighters
summary:
Hyperfighters brings back the rail shooter as you know it from the arcade: fast, explosive, addictive, and easy to learn: but so hard to beat the number one highscore!

Fourteen trigger-happy arcade-fun stages are now available for one or two players: Shoot dozens, hundreds, or even thousands of enemies out of the sky and water with three ultra modern fighters. This will require triggerhappy fingers and supersonic reflexes!

Face immense, massive and simply incredible endbosses that are each capable of destroying an entire nation by themselves. Do you have what it takes to destroy them all?

name: Hymn to the Earless God
summary: Turn-based RPG from the creator of Jimmy and the Pulsating Mass set on a brutal alien planet. Four unique main characters, four unforgettable stories, four inescapable calamities.

name: HyperBlade
summary: HyperBlade is a tactical sword fighting game inspired by titles such as Jedi Knight, Blade Symphony, and Super Smash Brothers. Combining physically-based tracers with mechanics found in traditional fighting games such as grapples, and combos HB aims for a unique blend of arcade and competitive

name: Hybrid
summary: These people aren't like you.

name: Hyper Detonator
summary: Hyper Detonator is a chain-reaction bullet hell shooter set in cyberspace. Blast through the virus spreading across the mainframe, and detonate bombs to set off devastating chain reactions. How long will you survive?

name: Hyperspeed
summary: There's no room for error when travelling at the speed of light, racing through star systems in a desperate search for a new world to house Mankind. But there are plenty of opportunities for mistakes. Alien races of every conceivable size, shape, temperament and sophistication seek to aid, use, corrupt or destroy you - and you don't know which.

name: Hyper Gunsport
summary: An arcade action game about shooting a ball into a goal. It's cyberpunk volleyball with guns.

name: Hyperdimension Neptunia: Producing Perfection
summary: You take on the role of the main character, who happens to fall into Gamindustri and is immediately hired by one of the four CPUs-Neptune, Noire, Blanc, and Vert-to be their producer and manage their idol careers. Get your training wheels on, ladies, because a new producer is in town and the fate of Gamindustri hangs in the balance! Will you be able to properly raise these CPUs into idols, or will their citizens be stolen away from them by the popular idol group MOB-48!? Teach these girls to sing, dance, and properly promote themselves to the general populace thanks in part to your expertise in training video game idols back on Earth. As the girls' popularity rises, they will be able to join one another in singing duets, or maybe even come together for a full ensemble!

name: Hyrule Warriors: Age of Calamity - Wave 1: Pulse of the Ancients
summary: Wave 1 includes an expanded roster, newly added weapon types, and challenging enemies. Dominate the battlefield as the playable Battle-Tested Guardian or try out the added Flail weapon for Link and Master Cycle for Zelda. These combat styles will come in handy as you face the challenging Apocalyptic difficulty and added enemies like the bomb-throwing Moblin and Giant Chuchu. You can also stop by the Royal Ancient Tech Lab to test yourself with new challenges!

name: Hyperchase Auto Race
summary:
The player controls a formula one race car whose objective is to advance through the rankings and either make the best time or accumulate as many points as possible depending on the game selected.

In Game 1, the player has unlimited cars and their goal is to finish the course in as little time as possible. In Game 2, the player receives 5 cars and the goal is to accumulate as many points as possible.

In both games, collision with either the edge of the track or other cars results in the loss of a life and the player is forced to start from a speed of zero.

name: Hyper Light Drifter: Special Edition
summary:
The wait is over, the worldwide acclaimed game Hyper Light Drifter is finally here with this impressive Special Edition!

Runs at 60fps, includes new exclusive content and all the previously released remastered for a perfectly inmersive gaming experience to play anywhere.

Explore a beautiful, vast and ruined world riddled with dangers and lost technologies. Echoes of a dark and violent past resonate throughout a savage land, steeped in treasure and blood. Hyper Light Drifter is an action adventure RPG in the vein of the best 16­bit classics, with modernized mechanics and designs on a much grander scale.

name: Hyper Meteor
summary: You are lost in space! All weapons are down! Survive by ramming your ship into meteors and hostile forces.

name: Hyper Shapes

name: Hyper Wars: The Mega Firestorm

name: Hyper Simon X
summary: Hyper Simon X is an Arcade Shoot' Em Up Puzzle game that combines the SHMUP mechanics with the oldschool 'Simon' memory games. You should hit the enemies with the special shot on the order showed, while shooting the others with the regular shot.

name: Hybris: Pulse of Ruin
summary: Embark on a journey about finding strength to stand up to challenge your destiny and discover a purpose beyond survival. Experience a deep story in a post-apocalyptic fantasy world. Enjoy an epic RPG with an innovative turn-based battle system.

name: Hypnotic Lights
summary:
[Unreleased 1983] puzzle game -- move rows and columns of squares to line up matching colors. 
 
While experimenting with Intellivision graphics, someone in the Design & Development department came up with a kaleidoscopic effect using sequenced GRAM. VP of Applications Software Gabriel Baum liked the effect, dubbed Hypnotic Lights, and asked programmer Steve Roney (Space Spartans) to work it into a game. 
 
Steve's reaction was pretty much: yeah, right, what game? Marketing had a suggestion: something sort of kind of like a Rubik's Cube. That's what Steve sort of kind of gave them. But while Steve continued to tinker with it when not working on higher priority games (including B-17 Bomber, Aquarius Utopia and Space Shuttle), Hypnotic Lights was never elevated to "official" status.

name: Hydroplane: Riptide Racers
summary: Hydroplane: Riptide Racers is a fast paced arcade racer. Race through the canal streets of Nautica to earn parts and piece together your ideal speed boat. Blast, jet, float, navigate, and dominate your way to first place to unlock equipment to play how you want.

name: Hytopia
summary: Blocky games platform where imagination is limitless

name: Hybrid Harmony
summary: A romantic comedy visual novel set in a modern fantasy world filled with mythical creatures and races! Shape your story through tons of meaningful choices, text characters and unlock wallpapers using an in-depth phone system, and learn about the world and it's lore with an expansive glossary!

name: Hype: The Time Quest
summary: Hype: The Time Quest is an adventure video game developed by Ubi Soft Montreal and published by Ubi Soft Entertainment. The game, released in the year 1999 along with Alex Builds His Farm (1999), is based on the medieval castle toy series from Playmobil. The U.S. version of the Game Boy Color version was supposed to be released in June 2000, but was delayed for over a year for some reason. The game revolves around Hype, a 22-year-old knight in the service of King Taskan IV, following a quest through time to return to his own era in order to save the kingdom from the evil black knight Barnak. The game was directed by Alain Tascan and featured thirty-two different voice actors, as well as original music by Robbi Finkel.

name: HyperNova: Escape from Hadea
summary: HyperNova: Escape from Hadea: a charming open world single-player RTS with quirky characters, beautiful planetary design and a healthy dollop of humor. It combines classic resource management, technology research and civilization building with intuitive tower-defense gameplay.

Unaware, you answer a distress call and become stranded, surrounded by monstrous foes. Unravel the mystery of this madness and stop its spread in this violent retro shooter!

name: Hyper Iria

Iria, being a skilled apprentice bounty hunter herself, tags along. What is the job, one might ask. It is to find out what has happened to the crew and cargo of a Space Station. Needless to say, nothing is as it seems, and the war between Iria and Zeiram begins in earnest.

name: Hydrophobia
summary:
In Hydrophobia the player takes the role of engineer Kate Wilson who works on the cruise ship Queen of the World. Unfortunately terrorists took over and placed bombs all over the ship and after detonating them chaos breaks loose. Now Kate has to fight for her life.

In this environment water plays an important role and it emphasizes realistic water representation. Water is the main component in many of the game's puzzles in which Kate uses her kinetic powers, gained in the second half. Other puzzles involve using an universal device to hack security installations (as a mini-game) or find out codes to open doors. Those are written in an invisible font on walls and have to made visible with her tool. The rest of the game consists of climbing sections and shoot outs with terrorists. Here the game uses a traditional cover system and five ammo types.

Move the kart with just the accelerator, brake, and steering wheel. The simplified driving operations give you a deep, authentic racer experience you can enjoy.

name: Hypno

name: Hyper color ball

name: Hyper Marbles
summary:
Hyper Marbles is an action game for the Sega Mega Drive, released exclusively in Japan via the Sega Game Toshokan service.

The object of Hyper Marbles is to knock all of your opponents into the electrical fences at the sides of the stage, while making sure you aren't knocked in yourself. A, B and C boosts.

name: Hyperspace
summary: This is a hardcore 3D detective/puzzle game. You will play as SU, a person from the future, who travels through wormholes across multiple timelines to solve puzzles, gather clues, and use deductive reasoning with the collected clues to uncover the truth.

name: Hyper Treasure: Macaronic Labyrinth
summary: A Super-dimensional Adventure Game. When you press something, happens something ...... Wander through a mysterious world, find your friend, and escape!!

name: Hydrophobia: Prophecy
summary: Hydrophobia is a action/adventure survivor game utilizing the revolutionary HydroEngine technology to place you inside the flooding lower decks of the Queen of the World. Flowing water behaves completely realistically, creating a chaotic, dangerous and ever-changing environment. As systems engineer Kate Wilson,, you must use every tool at your disposal to survive and escape the rising waters.

Hypersomnia is a fast-paced online shooter released as free software, aspiring to become an MMO with elements of RPG.

Set in a hypothetical afterlife reality, it shall provide joy through altruistic behaviours, fierce fights, fulfillment of elaborate social roles or sowing panic as a traitor to benevolent ones.

Declare allegiance to one of the three factions whose apple of discord is a disparity between prevailing notions of moral excellence. Metropolis. Atlantis. Resistance.

summary: The Colosseum + Characters DLC brings three additional characters (Kei Shinguji, Mina Nishizawa, Chika Hakozaki) and new Colosseum-exclusive battles + weapon drops.

name: Hyperdrive
summary: HYPERDRIVE is a fast paced Sci-fi action flight sim, combining the infinitely looping gameplay of a roguelike, along with the combat and controls of classic spaceship combat. Avoid obstacles, and take down enemy ships in high speed space combat, all while making as many deliveries as possible!

name: Hyperdimension Neptunia: Collector's Edition
summary: This unique RPG features game consoles personified as goddesses, CPUs (Console Patron Units), who you can customize visually with equipment to enhance their stats. Players take the role of Neptune and follow her quest to save the captive Histoire. This leads her to face the corrupt monsters ravaging the world of Gamindustri unleashed by the evil Arfoire.

name: Hysteric Kingdom
summary: Hysteric Kingdom is a hack 'n' slash game with frame-by-frame animations in a medieval setting inside its own universe, where you control the protagonist Afortunado. After a great tragedy, he ends up in prison and can only count on the help of a mysterious sword that appears to be more than just a weapon...

name: Hyperbolica
summary: Hyperbolica is a whimsical Non-Euclidean adventure with mind-bending worlds full of games, puzzles, mazes, and secrets! Immerse yourself in reality-warping geometries where lines can never be parallel, horizons are curved, and space grows exponentially.

name: Hyper Sports
summary:
Six tough events await in this joystick-waggling successor to Track &Field.

The full sequence of events is - swimming, skeet shooting, gymnastics, archery, triple jumping and weightlifting. You must complete each event in order to be allowed onto the next one.

Swimming involves moving left and right as fast as possible, while pressing fire when a breath is required. Skeet shooting and archery both come down to timing - though elevation and wind factors affect the latter. Gymnastics involves timing a succession of presses to ensure that the jump is long and the landing graceful. The triple jump involves one press for each part of the jump, whereas the weightlifting involves merely brute strength.

If the player wants to go to the next event or round, they will have to qualify by beating increasingly difficult maximum times or minimum targets.

name: Hyokkori Hyoutan-jima: Daitouryou wo Mezase!

name: HyperGate Mall
summary: run away and hide into the deepest of tunnels <3

name: Hyakka Yakou
summary: A fantasy Otome game by Otomate.

name: Hyper Bounce Blast

Use the unique bounce multiplier system to maximise power-ups, build your hyper and survive the onslaught! Featuring a fantastic soundtrack produced by electronic musician Quantum Firefly.

In Hyper Sports R, players can choose from a variety of 20+ characters to build up and compete. Become the best competitor in a variety of different sports, which include track and field, beach volleyball and swimming."

name: Hydroneer: Journey to Volcalidus
summary: Sail across the sea to Volcalidus, where a new adventure awaits. This expansion delivers new mechanics to the game to aid you in your mining expedition - from huge new vehicles, to interesting new progression systems.

name: Hydro Thunder
summary: The gameplay of Hydro Thunder consists of racing high-tech speedboats through treacherous environments, from the cold seas of the Arctic Circle, to a post-apocalyptic, flooded version of New York City.

name: Hyper Hentai Sexy Sensei
summary: Hyper Hentai Sexy Sensei is a relaxing puzzle game. With the theme of sexy teacher and multiple unique sexy girls. Enjoy sexy girls pictures and relaxing music to complete the puzzle.

name: Hydroplant Tycoon
summary: Start with tiny sprouts and nurture them into thriving crops using advanced hydroponics! Design your own farming system, experiment with different plants, customize your setup, and meet market demands to grow your business. Discover the perfect harmony of nature and technology!

name: Hydraulic Press
summary: Smash, collect, upgrade! Crush objects with your Hydraulic Press, earn coins, and unlock faster presses, bigger rewards, and brand-new objects to destroy! Each with unique visuals and satisfying effects.

name: Hyperdimension Neptunia Re;Birth1: Additional Content 1
summary: This package includes additional new quests and Coliseum battles

name: Hyperforma
summary: Hyperforma brings an entirely new take on the classic puzzle-based arcade genre with hacking sophisticated virtual systems being the basis of each of the over 80 unique levels.

name: Hypersensitive Bob
summary: Hypersensitive Bob is allergic to everything. Armed with a modified asthma pipe, Bob decides to explore the world and get over his allergies in order to lead a normal life in this low-poly, cartoony sky platform crawler.

name: Hypergun
summary: "Fight through waves of alien interlopers and save the world as Dewey Owens in Hypergun, a fast-paced roguelite shooter centering around a procedural weapon of questionable effectiveness. Enter the simulation. Build the Hypergun!"

name: Hypnotica Quest
summary:
Welcome to Hypnotica Quest! You find yourself in a strange little sleepy town that is obsessed with hypnosis. Your curiosity gets the better of you and you sign up for an experiment at the laboratory at the end of the street.

This is a little walking simulator game where you get to experience actual hypnosis, giant rats, magical guinea pigs and meet the famous (or rather) infamous Doctor Voldritch.

name: Hyperthymesia
summary: You are Hunoui, who enters a lucid dream with a device. You experience six REM sleep cycles together with Yomogi. To escape or to confront—these two completely different choices will lead you to redemption or plunge you into ruin?

name: Hyperlight Survivor
summary: A Competitive Bullet Hell with roguelite mechanics. Fight against endless hordes of enemies in ever-changing arenas, unlock new spaceships and upgrade them with devastating weapons and Power-Ups. Beat your highscore and reach new ranks to become the ultimate Champion!

Ravio
Yuga

name: Hydlide
summary: NES/Famicom port of Hydlide. An evil demon named Varalys casts a curse upon the princess Ann, turning her into three fairies. You control Sir Jim and set out to find the fairies, and then slay Varalys. Only by vanquishing Varalys can the curse be lifted. Once the princess is restored the kingdom will be saved. The fighting is a little more in-depth than hack and slash. You can either fight with a defensive or offensive stance, or you can use magic spells.

name: Hyper Princess Pitch
summary: Hyper Princess Pitch is an 8-directional shoot'em up where players fight Santa with explosions

name: Hyper Street Fighter II: The Anniversary Edition
summary: Hyper Street Fighter II: The Anniversary Edition is a modified port of Super Street Fighter II Turbo in which players can control any versions of the main characters from the five Street Fighter II games previously released for the arcades.

name: Hyper Square
summary:
Simple but challenging
The game has only one goal, under the pressure of time, try to place all the squares shown on the screen into the designated target as quickly as possible in order to get the highest score in each round. As the game progresses, the arrangement and layout of the blocks will become more and more complex. The only way to solve a puzzle within the time limit is to use different gestures to move the blocks at the same time.

name: Hyrax In The Rocks
summary: LOOK, USE, TALK, and TAKE your way through this old-school text-based mystery of a broken kingdom. Only you can pry at the castle cracks and discover what lies at the core of a heart-breaking disappearance.
